memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_side side, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const T *alpha, const T *A, rocblas_int lda, T *B, rocblas_int ldb)
memberdef.name: rocblas_trsm_template

detaileddescription.para: trsm solves op(A)*X = alpha*B or X*op(A) = alpha*B,
where alpha is a scalar, X and B are m by n matrices, A is triangular matrix and op(A) is one of op( A ) = A or op( A ) = A^T or op( A ) = A^H.
The matrix X is overwritten on B.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
rocblas_side. rocblas_side_left: op(A)*X = alpha*B. rocblas_side_right: X*op(A) = alpha*B.
rocblas_fill. rocblas_fill_upper: A is an upper triangular matrix. rocblas_fill_lower: A is a lower triangular matrix.
rocblas_operation. transB: op(A) = A. rocblas_operation_transpose: op(A) = A^T. rocblas_operation_conjugate_transpose: op(A) = A^H.
rocblas_diagonal. rocblas_diagonal_unit: A is assumed to be unit triangular. rocblas_diagonal_non_unit: A is not assumed to be unit triangular.
rocblas_int. m specifies the number of rows of B. m >= 0.
rocblas_int. n specifies the number of columns of B. n >= 0.
alpha specifies the scalar alpha. When alpha is &zero then A is not referenced and B need not be set before entry.
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU. of dimension ( lda, k ), where k is m when rocblas_side_left and is n when rocblas_side_right only the upper/lower triangular part is accessed.
rocblas_int. lda specifies the first dimension of A. if side = rocblas_side_left, lda >= max( 1, m ), if side = rocblas_side_right, lda >= max( 1, n ).

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_side side, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const float *alpha, const float *A, rocblas_int lda, float *B, rocblas_int ldb)

detaileddescription.para: trsm solves op(A)*X = alpha*B or X*op(A) = alpha*B,
where alpha is a scalar, X and B are m by n matrices, A is triangular matrix and op(A) is one of op( A ) = A or op( A ) = A^T or op( A ) = A^H.
The matrix X is overwritten on B.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
rocblas_side. rocblas_side_left: op(A)*X = alpha*B. rocblas_side_right: X*op(A) = alpha*B.
rocblas_fill. rocblas_fill_upper: A is an upper triangular matrix. rocblas_fill_lower: A is a lower triangular matrix.
rocblas_operation. transB: op(A) = A. rocblas_operation_transpose: op(A) = A^T. rocblas_operation_conjugate_transpose: op(A) = A^H.
rocblas_diagonal. rocblas_diagonal_unit: A is assumed to be unit triangular. rocblas_diagonal_non_unit: A is not assumed to be unit triangular.
rocblas_int. m specifies the number of rows of B. m >= 0.
rocblas_int. n specifies the number of columns of B. n >= 0.
alpha specifies the scalar alpha. When alpha is &zero then A is not referenced and B need not be set before entry.
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU. of dimension ( lda, k ), where k is m when rocblas_side_left and is n when rocblas_side_right only the upper/lower triangular part is accessed.
rocblas_int. lda specifies the first dimension of A. if side = rocblas_side_left, lda >= max( 1, m ), if side = rocblas_side_right, lda >= max( 1, n ).

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_side side, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const double *alpha, const double *A, rocblas_int lda, double *B, rocblas_int ldb)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dtrsm
